messages.title: CONSERVATIVE NHS BETRAYAL
messages.content: The Conservative candidate for North Northumberland failed to turn up for vital NHS meetings in the North East, despite being elected as local health governor.

messages.title: IT'S A TWO HORSE RACE
messages.content: Straight choice between Lib Dems or Conservative. In many areas across the country, Labour simply cannot win.

messages.title: Biggest ever rise in state pensions
messages.content: Lib Dem 'triple lock' on pensions has seen a year-on-year rise since 2010.

messages.title: Regaining control of our borders
messages.content: Lib Dems demand return of proper border checks so we know who's coming in and out of the UK.

messages.title: Memo reveals Tories won't rule out cuts to schools' budget
messages.content: David Cameron's Conservatives could potentially reduce education fundings.

messages.title: Lib Dems make extra money for NHS top priority
messages.content: Spending on NHS would be at least £8 billion higher per year with Lib Dems.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plan to stop the Conservative NHS betrayal by improving accountability; increase NHS spending by £8 billion.
Tories threaten school budget; Lib Dems will protect education funding.
Balance the budget in a fair way that’s fair.
Year-on-year rise in state pensions through the 'triple lock'.

mentions.candidate: Anne-Marie Trevelyan has shamefully never turned up at official health governor meetings.
mentions.tacticalSituation: It’s a two horse race between Liberal Democrats and Conservatives. Labour, UKIP and the Greens are out of the race.

issues.health: Conservative candidate's attendance record in Berwick as a local health governor is the worst.
issues.immigration: Lib Dems are working to bring back control to our borders.

politicalExperience.role: Elected Governor of Northumbria Hospitals, focusing on Berwick
politicalExperience.achievements: Attendance record was lacking, did not turn up for meetings.

endorsements.endorser: Local residents Mr. and Mrs. Hutson
endorsements.endorsement: Praise for the state pension increase provided by the Lib Dems.

quotes.text: Labour, UKIP and the Greens are of the race on May 7th. Many voters looking to stop the Conservatives are backing the Lib Dems.
